attributes.action: Say No to a State Funeral for Thatcher
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Tax payers money should not be spent on this because the former P.M.
1- Fought an unnecessary war when she reduced the S. Atlantic Fleet, sending the wrong signal to Galtieri.
2- Created housing shortages by not letting local authorities reinvest Council House sales in social housing.
3-Undermined the altruism that underpinned many public services relying instead on greed and fear to motivate
4-Let  values of thrift and mutual support exemplified by former Building Societies be ambushed by the greed and fear of venture capitalists - thus encouraging banking problems that taxpayers are now bailing out.
5- Transformed public utilities into cash and credit flow focused bodies instead of services.
6-Sustained the affront to humanity of white majority rule in South Africa.
7- Supported the undemocratic regime of Pinochet in Chile which killed the democratic leader of that country.
8-Made us more reliant on on other countries for energy by closing coal mines for political not economic reasons.
9- Destroyed  our manufacturing base at the expense of frothy financial services.
10- Diminished traditional values of respect for others and thus brought  about our broken society.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
